name: Create new records in Airtable from users in When I Work
description:
This template periodically extracts all users from When I Work and uses the retrieved information to create new records in Airtable.

Your Airtable table should have at least these columns:
1) Email as email (as a primary column)
2) First name as short line text
3) Last name as short line text

The template is scheduled to run every day at midnight. You can change the schedule after you set up the template. Note, this scenario may consume a lot of operations, depending on how many users you have in When I Work.
